In central Africa Transmutate lands by a small stream and starts 
crying.

Mutate: Ra-vage.....Sil-ver-bol-t.....Friend.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., dewboy30816@y... wrote:
> Transmutate flys over the abandoned pred base (we're not useing it 
for 
> anything are we). He gets upset again.
> 
> Mutate(it's shorter): No Friend. NO FRIEND!
> 
> He trys to send out energy waves but fails and even with his low 
> intellegence vaguely reconizies that the he only absorbed a little 
of 
> the lightning and is low on power.  Still, he starts flying toward 
> central Africa.
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., dewboy30816@y... wrote:
> > Transmutate flys over the original Maximal base. Or at least where 
> it 
> > was. He gets a sad look on his face.
> > 
> > Transmutate: No friend.
> > 
> > Then he begins to think that maybe they made friend with the Preds 
> and 
> > goes to see their base (I can't remember if he ever went to the 
Pred 
> > base but I can asume that Ravage told him about it).
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@y..., dewboy30816@y... wrote:
> > > He shouldn't be functional, but he is. Still, he looked like a 
> pile 
> > of 
> > > junk.  When Transmutate started to go offline he saw a light.  
In 
> > this 
> > > light stood many transformers.  Unicron, Optimus Prime, many 
> others 
> > > whose names have long been forgotten, others who have not yet 
gone 
> > > online.  They were all heros from 1 generation or another.  They 
> all 
> > > spoke the same simultanius sentence.
> > > Spirits: Transmutate. Your destiny has not been fulfilled.
> > > He lacked the intellegence to know who they were or understand 
> what 
> > > they meant, but still he did.  Suddenly, he was back in his 
body, 
> > but 
> > > spead throughout the segmeants that had been blown apart.  He 
> waited 
> > > for this destiny to come, but it failed.  His spark no longer 
had 
> > the 
> > > power it once did, he had no power at all.  His body was useless 
> to 
> > > him.
> > > 
> > > It is stormy (you wanted to incorparate the weather didn't you). 
 
> > All 
> > > of a sudden a lightening bolt hits his hand.  It comes to life 
and 
> > > attaches to his arm.  It continues to assemble Transmutate. He 
> > starts 
> > > talking when it's finished.
> > > 
> > > Transmutate: Friend....Sil-ver-bolt.....Ra-vage.
> > > 
> > > He gets a sad look.  Then he smiles stupidly.
> > > 
> > > Transmutate:  Find.....Flllllllly.
> > > 
> > > He flys up in the air.
> > > 
> > > OOC: Don't start complaining.  Transmutate was in one episonde 
of 
> > the 
> > > series.  He befriended Ravage and Silverbolt, but he hated 
> fighting 
> > > so much that when they started firing at each other he jumped in 
> the 
> > > way of the blast and cancelled it out.  He had enormous power, 
but 
> > no 
> > > way to control it.  When ever he attacked someone his energy 
just 
> > flew 
> > > out in all directions. He was so badly damaged his intellegence 
> was 
> > > barley that of a drone (Rhinox confirmed this), and I have big 
> plans 
> > > for him o.k. and a way to bring up his intellegence.
